findings.details: Mobile tap targets and spacing are tuned; no immediate layout collisions found in core templates.
Scanned templates/posts for obvious placeholder links; full runtime link validation not executed in this run.
Core layouts include SEO tags, Open Graph hints, and JSON-LD WebSite metadata.
Recent posts updated; no placeholder content detected in main templates.

recommendations: Limit third-party preconnects to pages where forms are rendered to reduce connection overhead.
Run a live link checker on external news links when network checks are available.
